rationale: No intensifier or comparative adjective directly modifies a risk-adjective from the specified list.
The segment describes culling ('culled') and food safety ('will not enter the food system') using neutral language.
The segment describes a future containment action ('will be culled') and provides a food safety assurance, which are Neutral/Q5 cues, not Q3.
The segment reports action taken (culled) and a bare negation ('will not enter the food system').
The segment does not contain a minimiser combined with a scale contrast.
